name: The Murder of Elisabeth Brown
description:
A murder in a theater. An actress killed on stage. Somebody switched the prop knife with a real one. At least that is what Jonathan Brown, the brother of the victim Elisabeth Brown, is claiming.

Play as a police officer and scour through your available data (video tapes, character profiles etc.) to find out who planted the real knife, or if Jonathan is lying, that lead to the death of Elisabeth Brown.

Feel free to download the file if web version doesn't work

External assets used:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/15JfeoOQqePyZvj6xG1WWPYvNjKIgk0gA/view?usp=shari...
